briefdescription.para: x component
y component
z component
r component
g component
b component
array of four floats mapped to the x,y,z,w components of the Vec3 useful for openGL fv data types this is mapped as a union to the following m_x == m_openGL[0] m_y == m_openGL[1] m_z == m_openGL[2]

simplesect.para: I've made this public as some compilers automatically make the anonymous unions public whereas clang++ complains see this post http://jonmacey.blogspot.com/2011/03/anonymous-union-struct-weirdness.html

briefdescription.para: default ctor use default and set to (0.0f,0.0f,0.0f) as attributes are initialised

simple Vec3 encapsulates a 3 float object like glsl vec3 but not maths use the Vec3 class for maths and the asVec3 to return a vec3
